item.description:
Dear Members,

Please rsvp for this meet. Meetup.com's site isn't working very well, so I am not sure how many of you ever got the invitation in the first place!!! Please forgive the reptition, because I just cannot tell who is getting these and who isn't!!!!

Also, if you would like to continue being part of this group, please send me your regular email addresses, because if I have to cancel meetup.com due to the fact that it seems impossible to operate the site, I can do so but still send invitations for future meets to you directly!!!!

Thanks,
Kim Lemaire
laptopmaltese@aol.colm
robinberry519@gmail.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group, Nov. 21st, 1-4pm, Holliston Meadows
